TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeComp

summary.span: 提供 介面的 Managed 定義。

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關`ITypeComp`介面，請參閱 MSDN Library。For more information about the `ITypeComp` interface, see the MSDN Library. 原生程式碼的 COM 方法傳回的 HRESULT 時，common language runtime 會擲回例外狀況。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 對應 Hresult 和例外狀況](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

summary.span: 對應名稱至型別的成員，或繫結包含於型別程式庫中的全域變數和函式。

span.span: Maps a name to a member of a type, or binds global variables and functions contained in a type library.
